DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of Tai chi on Fibromyalgia
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Tai Chi in Treating Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: 40 years of age or older meeting the classification of FM per the 1990 ACR criteria approval by a healthcare provider for participation had practiced Tai chi within the past 6 months had exercised >30 min three times weekly for past 3 months could not independently ambulate without assistive devices had BPI pain severity or interference scores less than 5 had planned elective surgery during study period were actively involved in healthrelated litigation were unwilling to keep all treatments/medications steady throughout the study period
